definition: personal strength/one's special ability or strong points
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Young people should be encouraged to choose their careers according to their own strong points.
sentences.chinese: 應該鼓勵年輕人按照自己的特長選擇職業。

sentences.english: We elected him monitor because he had the ability to bring out the best in others.
sentences.chinese: 我們選他當班長是因爲他有能力使別人充分發揮特長。

sentences.english: Ashraf has a background in software development and network infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 阿什拉夫在軟件開發和網絡基礎設施方面有專業特長。

sentences.english: Now that I am on the Island of Poems, I should …
sentences.chinese: 既然來到了詩之島，我怎麼也得發揮一下我的特長。

sentences.english: His poems had the classical language beauty, but didn't take the advantage of modern Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 有古典語言美卻難以發揮現代漢語的特長。

sentences.english: I want to obtain one to be able to further display my special skill and ability work.
sentences.chinese: 我非常想得到一份能進一步發揮我特長和能力的工作。

sentences.english: Describe the specific achievements and actions that have demonstrated the individual's strong competences.
sentences.chinese: 描述一下能夠證明個人能力特長的具體成就和行動。

sentences.english: Progress computer well and be good at speaking and listening English.
sentences.chinese: 個人特長，電腦操作熟練，較好的英語會話和聽力。

sentences.english: Signature strengths are the secret to experiencing more "flow" at work and in life.
sentences.chinese: 個人特長是在工作和生活中能不斷讓你提升的祕訣。

sentences.english: People can adapt their interests and talents through selected courses.
sentences.chinese: 人們可以依據自己的興趣和特長來選課。

sentences.english: With the characteristic of acid-resisting, corrosion-resisting, wear-resisting, long life time.
sentences.chinese: 具有耐酸性，抗腐蝕，耐老化，使用壽命特長的特點。

sentences.english: Have an expertised field or have decided to be focused in one field;
sentences.chinese: 專業方向與本所專業特長相吻合或者能形成互補。

sentences.english: How much do you think your personality and speciality have been played?
sentences.chinese: 你的個人能力及特長是否得到了發揮？

sentences.english: Machinable two machine interaction points workpiece.
sentences.chinese: 兩臺機牀聯動可加工特長工件。

sentences.english: In 2005, 58 students went to regular colleges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 2005年有58名特長生被本科院校錄取。

sentences.english: Systematic introduction and summarization are made for the construction of extra-long Qinling Tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 對秦嶺特長隧道的建設作了系統介紹和總結。

definition: specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
in one's spare time/outside working hours/amateur (historian etc)
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
interest (desire to know about sth)/interest (thing in which one is interested)/hobby/CL:個|个[ge4]
